data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Yalova, Turkey not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yalova, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Yalova.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Yalova.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 220,100 souls living in the state of Yalova with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Chechen people might believe through him.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 218,785, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Yalova, Turkey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Yalova, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Yalova
location.people_groups_list: Abkhaz, Arab, Syrian, Hemshin, Kurd, Kurmanji, Kabardian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Abkhaz (164,000), Arab, Syrian (587,000), Hemshin (22,000), Kurd, Kurmanji (2,200), Kabardian (1,177,000)
